name: Gladiator Tycoon
description:
A Game where you are hire gladiators to fight, equip them, and send them off to battle. 

---Update 4/6:
Fixed a bug that let you add too many fighters to your active roster.
Prettied up game a bit and made text easier to read.

***This game does not work in chrome right now. Use another browser or download the windows version***

Was a bit too much to take on for a jam, but it seems promising!

Game works, but is very buggy. Windows build will work, still working on web version.
